tasks.title: Set up project Structure
tasks.description: Initialize a new React app and install all required dependencies

tasks.title: Build the main UI components
tasks.description: Create a reusable Card, Button, and Modal component.

tasks.title: Implement basic CRUD functionality

tasks.title: Add sorting and filtering
tasks.description: Allow users to sort tasks by date and priority, and filter by status.
